title: Entering Primitive Forest · Beginning of Slaughter

scenes.description: 画面淡入,展现云雾缭绕的仙域上空,金色卷轴在空中展开,光芒闪动,背景音乐渐起。

visual.composition: Misty immortal skies with a golden scroll unfurling
visual.environment: Immortal realm sky filled with swirling clouds and golden light
visual.fx: Golden radiance and unfolding scroll effect

scenes.prompt: Xianxia opening, mist-wreathed immortal sky with a golden scroll unfurling, spiritual particles drifting, wide shot, cinematic lighting, 4K
scenes.narration: 我是云卷仙音,欢迎回来。第28集:进入原始密林·杀戮开始。

scenes.description: 韩立无法判断各处情况,只好随意挑选了一个方向而行,开始数日中除了一些偶尔蹦出的小兽和一些蛇虫外,并未有任何异常。

visual.composition: Han Li unable to judge situations, picks random direction, first few days only occasional small beasts and snakes, nothing unusual

scenes.prompt: Han Li unable to judge situations, picks random direction, first few days only occasional small beasts and snakes, nothing unusual.
scenes.narration: 韩立无法判断各处情况，只好随意挑选了一个方向而行，开始数日中除了一些小兽和蛇虫外，并未有任何异常。

scenes.description: 五日后,韩立面前出现了一眼无法望到头的原始密林,树木全都三四十丈之高。

visual.composition: Five days later, endless primitive forest appears before Han Li, trees all thirty to forty zhang tall
visual.character_pose: Han Li looking at massive forest

scenes.prompt: Five days later, endless primitive forest appears before Han Li, trees all thirty to forty zhang tall.
scenes.narration: 五日后，韩立面前出现了一眼无法望到头的原始密林，树木全都三四十丈之高。

scenes.description: 密林枝叶肥大,幽暗阴凉,不时能从里面隐隐听到一些低沉兽吼声。

visual.composition: Forest with large leaves, dark and cool, can faintly hear low beast roars from within

scenes.prompt: Forest with large leaves, dark and cool, can faintly hear low beast roars from within.
scenes.narration: 密林枝叶肥大,幽暗阴凉,不时能从里面隐隐听到一些低沉兽吼声。

scenes.description: 韩立双目微眯地看了一会儿,蓦然抬腿走进了其中,几个晃动后,身形就消失在高大树木之后。

visual.composition: Han Li narrows eyes and watches, suddenly steps into forest, after several movements, figure disappears behind tall trees

scenes.prompt: Han Li narrows eyes and watches, suddenly steps into forest, after several movements, figure disappears behind tall trees.
scenes.narration: 韩立双目微眯地看了一会儿，蓦然抬腿走进了其中，几个晃动后，身形消失在高大树木之后。

scenes.description: 韩立施展罗烟步,即使森林中藤蔓遍地,灌木成群,他仍然犹如鬼魅,仿佛成了无形之体一般在里面行进自如。

visual.composition: Han Li uses Mist Step, even with vines everywhere and bushes, moves like ghost, seems intangible, travels freely
visual.character_pose: Han Li moving through forest like ghost

scenes.prompt: Han Li uses Mist Step, even with vines everywhere and bushes, moves like ghost, seems intangible, travels freely.
scenes.narration: 韩立施展罗烟步,即使森林中藤蔓遍地,灌木成群,他仍然犹如鬼魅,仿佛成了无形之体一般在里面行进自如。

scenes.description: 忽然行进中的韩立,银光一闪,一道银线激射而出,围着附近一颗数丈粗的大树一绕,又飞射而回。

visual.composition: Suddenly moving Han Li, silver light flashes, silver line shoots out, wraps around thick tree, flies back

scenes.prompt: Suddenly moving Han Li, silver light flashes, silver line shoots out, wraps around thick tree, flies back.
scenes.narration: 忽然行进中的韩立,银光一闪,一道银线激射而出,围着附近一颗数丈粗的大树一绕,又飞射而回。

scenes.description: 一声凄厉的吼叫从树后爆发而出,接着腥风一起,一头头上生有独角、两丈来高的黄色巨熊从树后一闪而出。

visual.composition: Miserable roar from behind tree, stench wind rises, yellow giant bear with single horn, two zhang tall, flashes from behind tree

scenes.prompt: Miserable roar from behind tree, stench wind rises, yellow giant bear with single horn, two zhang tall, flashes from behind tree.
scenes.narration: 一声凄厉的吼叫从树后爆发而出,接着腥风一起,一头头上生有独角、两丈来高的黄色巨熊从树后一闪而出。

scenes.description: 黄色巨熊在吼声中狠狠扑向不远处的韩立,但韩立身形连晃几下,就到了数丈外,对这只巨熊视若无睹。

visual.composition: Yellow giant bear roars and fiercely pounces toward Han Li, but Han Li moves several times, reaches several zhang away, ignores bear

scenes.prompt: Yellow giant bear roars and fiercely pounces toward Han Li, but Han Li moves several times, reaches several zhang away, ignores bear.
scenes.narration: 黄色巨熊在吼声中狠狠扑向不远处的韩立,但韩立身形连晃几下,就到了数丈外,对这只巨熊视若无睹。

scenes.description: 噗通一声,巨熊方扑出几步,就鲜血激射,整个身子从腰部一下分成了两截。

visual.composition: Thud sound, giant bear just pounces a few steps, blood sprays, entire body splits into two from waist
visual.character_pose: Bear cut in half, blood spraying

scenes.prompt: Thud sound, giant bear just pounces a few steps, blood sprays, entire body splits into two from waist.
scenes.narration: 噗通一声,巨熊方扑出几步,就鲜血激射,整个身子从腰部一下分成了两截。

scenes.description: 身后的那颗巨树也发出一声闷响,树干一分二,上半截直接倒落而下,正好将巨熊的尸体掩盖住了。

visual.composition: The giant tree behind also makes dull sound, trunk splits in two, upper half falls down, covering bear corpse

scenes.prompt: The giant tree behind also makes dull sound, trunk splits in two, upper half falls down, covering bear corpse.
scenes.narration: 身后的那颗巨树也发出一声闷响,树干一分二,上半截直接倒落而下,正好将巨熊的尸体掩盖住了。

scenes.description: 韩立一出手,竟然同时斩断了巨树和斩杀了巨熊,地蛟筋所化银线太过锋利,直到现在才显现出一切来。

visual.composition: Han Li's single strike simultaneously cut giant tree and killed giant bear, Earth Dragon Tendon silver wire too sharp, only now showing all effects

scenes.prompt: Han Li's single strike simultaneously cut giant tree and killed giant bear, Earth Dragon Tendon silver wire too sharp, only now showing all effects.
scenes.narration: 韩立一出手,竟然同时斩断了巨树和斩杀了巨熊,地蛟筋所化银线太过锋利,直到现在才显现出一切来。

scenes.description: 这时的韩立,早已在闪动中再次消失在了密林之中,于是韩立在落日之墓中的杀戮之行,才真正的开始。

visual.composition: By now Han Li has already disappeared into dense forest again, thus Han Li's slaughter journey in Sunset Tomb truly begins

scenes.prompt: By now Han Li has already disappeared into dense forest again, thus Han Li's slaughter journey in Sunset Tomb truly begins.
scenes.narration: 这时的韩立,早已在闪动中再次消失在了密林之中,于是韩立在落日之墓中的杀戮之行,才真正的开始。

scenes.description: 三个月后,在一片陌生山脉的深处传来一连串巨响,尖鸣声和嘶吼声交织成一片。

visual.composition: Three months later, series of loud sounds from deep in unfamiliar mountain range, sharp cries and roars interweaving

scenes.prompt: Three months later, series of loud sounds from deep in unfamiliar mountain range, sharp cries and roars interweaving.
scenes.narration: 三个月后,在一片陌生山脉的深处传来一连串巨响,尖鸣声和嘶吼声交织成一片。

scenes.description: 轰的一声巨响后,一切又再次的安静下来。

visual.composition: After thunderous boom, everything becomes quiet again

scenes.prompt: After thunderous boom, everything becomes quiet again.
scenes.narration: 轰的一声巨响后,一切又再次的安静下来。

scenes.description: 韩立双手倒背地站在一个离地十余丈高的横木上,神色平静异常,在他四周,一群青色猿猴的尸体横七竖八地躺了一地。

visual.composition: Han Li stands on horizontal branch ten zhang high, hands behind back, expression calm, around him green ape corpses scattered everywhere
visual.character_pose: Han Li standing, ape corpses around

scenes.prompt: Han Li stands on horizontal branch ten zhang high, hands behind back, expression calm, around him green ape corpses scattered everywhere.
scenes.narration: 韩立双手倒背地站在一个离地十余丈高的横木上,神色平静异常,在他四周,一群青色猿猴的尸体横七竖八地躺了一地。

scenes.description: 这些猿猴一个个膀大腰圆,身上猿毛粗硬之极,同时口中露出两根数寸长獠牙,让它们的面孔狰狞异常。

visual.composition: These apes all broad-shouldered, extremely coarse fur, two-inch fangs showing, making faces extremely fierce

scenes.prompt: These apes all broad-shouldered, extremely coarse fur, two-inch fangs showing, making faces extremely fierce.
scenes.narration: 这些猿猴一个个膀大腰圆,身上猿毛粗硬之极,同时口中露出两根数寸长獠牙,让它们的面孔狰狞异常。

scenes.description: 最让人心惊的,却是十余丈外的一颗粗大树干上,一只浑身红毛、生有一大两小三颗头颅的巨大妖猴,被一杆黑色长枪从心脏处洞穿而过,硬生生钉在了那里。

visual.composition: Most shocking, on thick trunk ten zhang away, red-furred giant demon ape with one large and two small heads, pierced through heart by black spear, nailed to tree

scenes.prompt: Most shocking, on thick trunk ten zhang away, red-furred giant demon ape with one large and two small heads, pierced through heart by black spear, nailed to tree.
scenes.narration: 最让人心惊的,却是十余丈外的一颗粗大树干上,一只浑身红毛、生有一大两小三颗头颅的巨大妖猴,被一杆黑色长枪从心脏处洞穿而过,硬生生钉在了那里。

scenes.description: 巨猿七窍流血,浑身伤痕累累,刚刚一命呜呼的样子。

visual.composition: Giant ape bleeding from seven orifices, covered in wounds, just died

scenes.prompt: Giant ape bleeding from seven orifices, covered in wounds, just died.
scenes.narration: 巨猿七窍流血,浑身伤痕累累,刚刚一命呜呼的样子。

scenes.description: 韩立仔细打量着巨猿尸体一会儿,口中喃喃地说道:'才不过走到这里,就碰到了结丹期妖兽。落日之墓,果然名不虚传!'

visual.composition: Han Li examines giant ape corpse, mutters: 'Just reached here, already met Core Formation beast. Sunset Tomb, truly worthy of reputation!'

scenes.prompt: Han Li examines giant ape corpse, mutters: 'Just reached here, already met Core Formation beast. Sunset Tomb, truly worthy of reputation!'
scenes.narration: 韩立仔细打量着巨猿尸体一会儿,口中喃喃地说道:'才不过走到这里,就碰到了结丹期妖兽。落日之墓,果然名不虚传!'

scenes.description: 韩立抬手虚空一抓,手指上灵戒青光一闪,黑枪从树干上一颤,就自行拔出的倒射而回,巨猿尸体也一下从树干上坠落而下。

visual.composition: Han Li reaches out, spirit ring on finger flashes green, black spear trembles on trunk, pulls itself out and flies back, giant ape corpse falls from trunk

scenes.prompt: Han Li reaches out, spirit ring on finger flashes green, black spear trembles on trunk, pulls itself out and flies back, giant ape corpse falls from trunk.
scenes.narration: 韩立抬手虚空一抓,手指上灵戒青光一闪,黑枪从树干上一颤,就自行拔出的倒射而回,巨猿尸体也一下从树干上坠落而下。

scenes.description: 韩立单手抓住了长枪,随即身形一动,就化为一道虚影的直接没入了密林深处,一时间,这里再次寂静无声起来。

visual.composition: Han Li catches spear with one hand, body moves, becomes shadow, directly enters deep forest, place becomes silent again

scenes.prompt: Han Li catches spear with one hand, body moves, becomes shadow, directly enters deep forest, place becomes silent again.
scenes.narration: 韩立单手抓住了长枪,随即身形一动,就化为一道虚影的直接没入了密林深处,一时间,这里再次寂静无声起来。

scenes.description: 画面淡出,夜色下的仙城剪影,天空洒落灵光,画面逐渐变暗。

visual.composition: Silhouette of the immortal city beneath night, spiritual light raining from the heavens
visual.environment: Night sky, city silhouette, floating light particles

scenes.prompt: Xianxia ending, immortal city silhouette under the night sky, spiritual particles drifting down, calm mysterious atmosphere, wide shot, cinematic lighting, 4K
scenes.narration: 下一集再见。我是云卷仙音,原著作者忘语。第29集即将开始。
